title: Zinc oxide nanoflake/reduced graphene oxide nanocomposite-based dual-acting electrodes for solar-assisted supercapacitor applications
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1965-1976
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00253A, Paper

Cigdem Tuc Altaf, Tuluhan Olcayto Colak, Arpad Mihai Rostas, Crina Socaci, Mihaela Diana Lazar, Lucian Barbu Tudoran, Mohamad Hasan Aleinawi, Feray Bakan Misirlioglu, Ipek Deniz Yildirim, Emre Erdem, Nurdan Demirci Sankir, Mehmet Sankir
There is an ever-growing requirement for systems that enable both conversion and storage of solar energy in the same device, thereby reducing the need for grid electricity and fossil fuels.
